src.system

Class DataStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.system.AppExceptions
      • src.system.Actions
        • src.system.DataStorage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable

    public class DataStorage
extends Actions
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable

    DataStoragen class

    Acts as an core of a program, it holds ArrayLists of instances. All data regarding key logic is here. private ArrayList<Person> allCitizens; private ArrayList <InsuranceCompany> allInsurance; It allows programmer for an easy data access.
    Since:
    2019
    Author:
    Maros Kusnir
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
